entry.title: These Are the Days Returned
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,708Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 124

Summary: Bruce wakes up in a Gotham that isn’t his own—younger, unscarred, in a world where Batman never existed. He is surrounded by children who still found their way into vigilantism without his intervention, who look at him with affection and wariness in equal measure.They believe he’s their Bruce, recovering from a brutal attack, but he knows he isn’t. But as he plays along, trying to piece together the secrets of this world and the reason for his presence here, staying silent may prove just as dangerous—because whoever wanted this world’s Bruce Wayne dead isn’t finished yet.

entry.title: you're just a sad song with nothing to say
entry.summary:
Author: cinderellion

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,267Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 104

Summary: "Bruce, are these scars from...electricity?" Clark's voice was shaky. His eyes were full of fear as his fingers traced down the scars along his chest.Bruce sighed heavily. Sounding tired more so than normal, "Yeah, from my time in Arkham."Or,Bruce has always had scars, and sometimes people could help but didn't know how to, or couldn't completely, or simply there was nobody there.Now there seemed to be someone who knew exactly how to help. How to heal both those physical and mental scars.

entry.title: And You, My Father, There on the Sad Height
entry.summary:
Author: notalegalist

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,555Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 583

Summary: Batman had long become resistant to Scarecrow’s Fear Toxin. Like he did with every villain he encountered, he had now had years of training combatting the vicious reagent, having developed multiple contingencies and mental tricks to escape its grasp. Yet, nothing had prepared him for a nearly imperceptible and slow-acting version of the drug.The Justice League begins to learn what the Dark Knight with no restraint looks like.

entry.title: Hidden Royals
entry.summary:
Author: Rinning_Away

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 575Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: It was too quick too fast an unknown group attacked her kingdom. Not an attack on the crown... no. An attack on every living thing on the kingdom's ground. It was supposed to be a day of joy and remembrance. Now it represents the death of thousands. Her birthday will never be the same. She travels far to safety. At least safer than her home. With only one servant. The only one that lived. They were both teens. Scared and alone. But fear mustn't consume her. She will revive what was once hers.

entry.title: Bruce Goes Batty
entry.summary:
Author: AtlasDaMoth

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,074Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 615

Summary: In Bruce Wayne's opinion, as The Batman and Gotham's Billionaire, magic was both incredibly illogical, and quite stupid. Guns, swords, secret plots and evil schemes, he could deal with it all. Except for magic. Spells, curses, it was all unknown to him, and he hated it.He formed that idea on the subject at least a good three years ago. And now, as he stares at himself in the mirror, shaking hands gripping the long bat ears that had sprouted upon his head, he finds himself proven right yet again.Magic. Stupid, stupid magic.

entry.title: Cursed Child
entry.summary:
Author: J4YYYZ

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,546Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 296

Summary: Bruce gets de-aged into a 16-year old after being hit by an alien weapon from an attempted invasion. The 16 year old who trained under the LOA.The 16 year old who ran away from Alfred.The 16 year old who was manipulated into something else.The 16 year old who was made a weapon.The 16 year old who never had a childhood. Bruce tries to forget the days of when he trained under Ra's, but small habits and reflexes he thought were long gone start to resurface, along with memories being freshly remembered as if it was yesterday. It haunts him slowly, eating him out from the inside before taking action after playing with its food.

entry.title: In Alternate Relation
entry.summary:
Author: Effi_Bee

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,920Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 304

Summary: As he lay on his back in the snow, his soon to be murderer already long gone, he couldn’t help but find this situation ironically funny. How it started this way; a bullet lodging itself into a chest. The start and-however pathetic-end of Spider-Man. He had gone full circle now. Hilarious. or Peter Benjamin Parker dies in his world alone and forgotten, only to appear in a different dimension on a different earth in an unknown city with mysterious heroes. Vigilantes? Or are they just urban legends? He decides to start a new chapter in his-new-life, because isn't that what you do when you are supposed to be dead? You move on. (It doesn't matter that it's not really working. It's the effort that counts.)

entry.title: Operation: Chaos on the Runway
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,557Chapters: 10/11Kudos: 127

Summary: In an epic celebration for reaching 4 million subscribers on Cass and Steph's channel, the duo decides to host a livestream guaranteed to break the internet. Their grand plan? Revealing to the world that the mysterious dancer "C" is none other than Cassandra Cain Wayne. But this revelation barely scratches the surface of the night's most explosive moments. With every family member determined to help celebrate, the fun atmosphere quickly escalates into a wild dance competition - because when have the Waynes ever done anything without turning it into a rivalry? Secretly rehearsed choreographies, ruthless judges, and a side bet about their boyfriends' reaction times turn the night into an absolute spectacle. The Batfamily's legendary intensity meets chaotic fun in this unforgettable livestream event where every move could spark new memes and every reveal sends the fandom into meltdown.

entry.title: Lord of Shadows
entry.summary:
Author: GabrielRamos

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,880Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 0

Summary: No one knows where he came from. Only that he survived something that would have destroyed anyone else. Gotham was his forge, but the world is his battlefield. There are secrets that will never be revealed—and a power no one dares name. In the end, there will be no heroes, villains, or gods: only him, and all the others below.

entry.title: How to save Bruce Wayne from himself
entry.summary:
Author: MiratheLumina

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,705Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 30

Summary: So English is not my first language *shy* but I have this prompt that I have been in love with for a long time so I was thinking: maybe I can write it and if someone likes it maybe them can write a fic based on it, who knows, maybe someone can get out of a block with this prompt Take a look, see if you like, and if you end up writing a fix based on it, u can please leave a comment warning it so I can go and read? 🥹

entry.title: In Shadows We Bind Our Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: RaineKellen64

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,348Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 509

Summary: The Batkids are stuck in a time loop where Bruce sacrifices himself to save them every time. Once they break the time loop, nothing is going to stop them from keeping their dad safe, even from himself.OrThe consequences of losing your dad one too many times.OrI love platonic yandere and overprotective Batkids, so I wrote it.-----------------------I have barely read any Batman comics, but I've read a boat load of fanfiction of them. They are OOC.P.S. There is no time line. The title is temporary. This is only my second fic.

entry.title: Bruce's Incidental Grandchild Acquisition
entry.summary:
Author: sleepberries

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,928Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 583

Summary: Bruce Wayne had long accepted that life with his adopted family would never be conventional—but he wasn’t prepared for the tidal wave of grandchildren. Batman may be prepared for Gotham’s criminals, but nothing prepared him for becoming Grandpa.  (Or, five times Bruce is underprepared for a grandchild and one time he's overprepared.)
